A ticket to access the Road to Sinnoh: Hatch Timed Research. This will give you the following bonuses from Monday, February 19, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, February 25, 2024, at 8:00 p.m. local time:

- 2× Hatch XP
- 2× Hatch Stardust
- 2× Hatch Candy

Research rewards include the following:

- Pikachu Mask avatar item
- One Super Incubator
- 4,000 Stardust
- Opportunities to encounter Pachirisu, Chatot, Carnivine, and more!

A ticket to access the Road to Sinnoh: Raids Timed Research. This will give you the following bonuses from Monday, February 19, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, February 25, 2024, at 8:00 p.m. local time:

- Additional 5,000 XP awarded for successful raids
- One additional Candy awarded for catching Pokémon in five-star raids
- Two additional free Raid Passes per day from spinning Gym Photo Discs

Research rewards include the following:

- Eevee Mask avatar item
- 5 Heatran Candy XL, 5 Giratina Candy XL, 5 Cresselia Candy XL, and 5 Darkrai Candy XL
- 10 Dialga Candy and 10 Palkia Candy

A ticket to access the Carnival of Love Timed Research from Tuesday, February 13, at 10:00 a.m. to Thursday, February 15, 2024, at 8:00 p.m. local time, wherever you are. Research rewards include: - Five encounters with Spinda with a heart pattern - 2 Incense - 5,000 XP - 2,500 Stardust Please note that Timed Research expires. The tasks associated with this Timed Research must be completed and their rewards claimed before February 15, 2024, at 8:00 p.m. local time. You must play during the specified time to receive all the special event bonuses.

5 surprise encounters with Litten in GO Snapshot
2× XP for spinning PokéStops while in a Party
Use {0} Incense or Daily Adventure Incense
Use an Incense or Daily Adventure Incense
Great to see you, %PLAYERNAME%! We’ve got all sorts of Pokémon to catch—and plenty of research that needs doing—ahead of us. I can’t wait to get started!
Which of these Pokémon are you looking forward to encountering the most?
Hey, %PLAYERNAME%! You know, I had an odd dream the other night... I was spitting fire!
Then the strangest coincidence happened—when I woke up, there were more Litten around than usual!
I’d love to observe them more closely, but it takes time to get them to trust you, so it’s easier said than done.
But I bet with that spark and determination of yours, you just might be able to get some of them to warm up to you.
Color me impressed! It’s amazing that you managed to gain their trust so quickly.
For my part, I just can’t help smothering Litten with attention—though I’m sure they’d rather I didn’t.
How do I know? Because if you try too hard to get close to one, it won’t open up to you.
Tell you what—why don’t you try evolving Litten into Torracat, then fill me in on what you learn in the process of building your friendship.
Brilliant work, Trainer! Let’s have a look at your fiery new Torracat.
Take a peek at its throat—see that bell of flame? It rings brightly whenever Torracat spits fire.
It also boasts powerful front legs. With a single punch, it can bend an iron bar right over!
How about we help this fur-ocious fighter burn even brighter?
Whew! Why do I feel like I’m about to melt?! Oh—you’ve evolved your Torracat into Incineroar!
Did you know the temperature of the flames from its navel exceeds 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit? And that’s not all!
Incineroar is equally formidable when it’s hurling ferocious punches or flinging furious kicks! Speaking of formidable, %PLAYERNAME%—you’ve really evolved into quite the Trainer yourself.
I can’t wait to see how much further you’ll go. Until next time, keep that fire of yours burning hot!
Aha! I hoped we’d have a run-in today, %PLAYERNAME%!
I was out hiking earlier when I saw a quick flash of something in the trees—something unusual.
I can’t say for certain, but it may have been the Mythical Pokémon Zarude! Or possibly just some falling leaves.
Either way, would you keep an eye—or even two—out for any unusual Grass-type Pokémon while you’re exploring?
%PLAYERNAME%, just the person I wanted to see!
I managed to spot our elusive friend again, and I can confirm that it’s definitely a Pokémon!
Unfortunately, it zipped away before I could get a closer look. Why don’t you canvas the area?
In the meantime, I’ll put my nose to my notes and see if I can’t confirm its identity.
Excellent, you’re back! I’ve got fantastic news, %PLAYERNAME%!
After digging into my archives, I can confirm that this mystery Pokémon is indeed none other than the Mythical Pokémon Zarude!
They tend to move in packs, but I can’t be certain how many we’re dealing with. It doesn’t matter, though. Either way, we must approach carefully!
I’m going to dive back into research and uncover whatever I can about Zarude’s behavior to help you prepare for this encounter.
Welcome back, %PLAYERNAME%! I have some super interesting tidbits to share about our elusive friend, Zarude!
When the vines on its body are torn off, they enrich the soil, and cause plants to grow large and lush.
Interesting, right? And useful, too! Do be on the lookout for any unusually lush areas—that could indicate a Zarude is close by!
You take care of that and let me know what you find. I’ll take some more time to study up.
%PLAYERNAME%, thanks to your exemplary field work, we’ve managed to locate the exact location of our Zarude.
I don’t think I have to remind you to be careful—it’s incredibly aggressive, and other forest Pokémon fear it. But I’m sure a talented Trainer like you can earn its trust in no time.
Just treat it like any other Pokémon—approach with patience and an open heart. Then I’m sure you’ll have yourself a steadfast new companion!
Great work so far, and good luck with what’s to come!
Hey, %PLAYERNAME%! Great to see you, as always.

Enabling this setting will allow you to transfer Legendary Pokémon, Ultra Beasts, and certain Mythical Pokémon when selecting multiple Pokémon in your Pokémon storage. Transferring Pokémon to Professor Willow cannot be undone.
Increased chance of finding XXS and XXL Oddish
Increased chance of finding XXS and XXL Pidgey!
More Litten are appearing in the wild!
Complete the Rogue of the Jungle Special Research story to encounter Zarude
Congratulations! You have successfully redeemed an offer online.
Hi, %PLAYERNAME%. I have some troubling news to share.
Team GO Rocket members have been popping up in greater numbers—and you and I both know that wherever those troublemakers are, chaos is sure to follow.
We need more info. Why don’t you go confront some of them and see what intel you can get your hands on?
The more we learn, the better prepared we’ll be to stop them—that’s the power of knowledge!
Those Team GO Rocket Grunts weren’t the chatty sort, were they, %PLAYERNAME%?
Not to worry! We’ll just cut right to the source and find where their rabble-rousing leaders are hiding!
But until we can track them down, keep seeking out Grunts and purify any Shadow Pokémon you come across. Rescuing them from those rascals is a top priority.
I know a Trainer like you is more than up to the task!
Great work out there, %PLAYERNAME%! I wish I could say I did as well with my own search here.
Sadly, I haven’t been able to track down Team GO Rocket’s leaders—Arlo, Cliff, and Sierra. Not to worry, though! Any professor worth their salt always has a plan B!
If you can collect some Mysterious Components, we’ll be able to knock together a Rocket Radar!
With top-tier tech like that in our hands, there’s no way those miscreants will be able to hide from us.
Amazing work, %PLAYERNAME%! You really gave those Team GO Rocket leaders what for!
That said, even putting their leaders out of commission hasn’t put a stop to Team GO Rocket’s activity. Which means we’ll need to escalate our little issue all the way to the top—to Giovanni.
Be careful, though. He’s more powerful than any other member of Team GO Rocket. But if there’s anyone who can put him in his place, it’s you.
Kudos to you, %PLAYERNAME%! You showed Giovanni and his band of bullies and malcontents that they aren’t welcome around here!
...For now, at least. There’s not a doubt in my mind that those louts will be back eventually. But at least for now, the Pokémon in this area are safe, and we have you to thank.
A victory like this calls for a celebration—perhaps a nice bowl of Pinap Berries?
And know I speak from the heart when I say this: thank you for keeping the Pokémon of our world safe. Now go and enjoy some well-earned rest!
You won’t believe the wondrous sight I stumbled upon—an unfamiliar Pokémon not documented in any of my notes!
I only glimpsed the creature briefly, but its vivid purple and pink palette seemed almost otherworldly.
Our good friend Rhi might have a thought or two about this mysterious Pokémon.
Why don’t you see if you can find our enigmatic new friend while I describe the discovery to Rhi?
As Professor Willow surmised, I am familiar with the being you have encountered.
It is an Ultra Beast known as Poipole.
In my world, this Ultra Beast is liked well enough to be chosen as a first partner companion.
It is a mystery as to why this Poipole has ventured so far. Perhaps it even traveled through an Ultra Wormhole.

This ticket includes your choice of additional encounters with Chinchou, Electrike, Joltik, Blitzle, or Helioptile.

While this Timed Research is active, any Pokémon encountered have the same chance of appearing as Shiny Pokémon as those that can be encountered via Field Research tasks during the event.

This Timed Research will be available on March 3, 2024, from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m. local time and will challenge you to complete Field Research tasks that require you to encounter more of the featured Pokémon of your choice!

Includes: • An encounter with the Mythical Pokémon Marshadow • Up to 9 free Raid Passes each day from spinning Gym Photo Discs • Special Pokémon hatching from 7 km Eggs • Incense may attract special Pokémon • A higher chance to encounter Shiny Pokémon during the event Additional content: • Purchase by June 6 and play between May 31 and June 6 for Timed Research that awards the Moon Crown avatar item! • Purchase by May 6 and play between April 30 and May 6 for Timed Research that awards early access to the Sun Crown avatar item AND the Timed Research described above! Please note that you can only purchase one version of the Pokémon GO Fest 2024: Global ticket. If you purchase this version, you will not be able to purchase the version that includes a unique T-shirt avatar item in an exclusive color.
Includes: • Premium in-game items, such as Rare Candies, Ultra Balls, and more • Extra encounters with Litten and its Evolutions
Includes: • Eight additional Raid Passes from spinning Photo Discs at Gyms • Increased chance to receive Rare Candy XL from raids • 50% more XP and 2× Stardust for successfully completing raids
Includes: • Eight additional Raid Passes from spinning Photo Discs at Gyms • Increased chance to receive Rare Candy XL from raids • 50% more XP and 2× Stardust for successfully completing raids
Included rewards: • An encounter with Pawniard • 6 Mysterious Components, 1 Super Incubator, and 1 Rocket Radar

This ticket includes three Timed Research opportunities, which you will automatically get access to as they become available. Purchasing this ticket will grant you access to the first Timed Research. Rewards for Part 1: - Poipole Helmet avatar item - Encounters with Beedrill, Galarian Slowpoke, and Cacnea - 1 Premium Battle Pass, 1 Incense, 5 Rare Candies, 1 Lucky Egg, 1 Star Piece, and more - 20,000 XP and 10,000 Stardust! Details about the next two Timed Research opportunities and the premium rewards they include will be revealed soon! Please note that if you purchase this version of the Wonder Ticket, you will not be able to purchase the version that comes with additional items. Information about these premium bonus items is available on our website.

Included rewards: • An encounter with Zarude • Encounters with Galarian Zigzagoon, Seedot, Cacnea, Absol, and Scraggy • 5 Rare Candies, 10 Zarude Candy, 3 Zarude Candy XL • 2 Premium Battle Passes, 1 Incense, 10 Ultra Balls, 6 Silver Pinap Berries, and more!
